Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: THE HUNT FOR BIN LADEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The inside story of the 20-year, billion dollar hunt for Osama bin Laden is revealed, featuring accounts from White House, intelligence, and military leaders involved in his capture.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Progeny of the Queen Sheba: Yemen & Saudi Arabia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With the end of the civil war, the people of Yemen are now building a new country and excavating the remains of the palace of the Queen of Sheba as a way of regaining Yemeni ethnic pride.

Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Inquire as to whether the idea of a perfect society is, indeed, possible.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Science of Big Waves, Spider Boat and Killer Tree Disease
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The monster waves at Mavericks attract big wave surfers from around the world. But what makes them so big? And, engineer Ugo Conti who has sailed the world has always suffered from seasickness. See his "Proteus" design- a spider-like sea craft made for smoother sailing. And Sudden Oak Death is a killer with no cure and it's devastating oak trees around the world.

Clip.Title: BETWEEN EARTH AND SKY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Sebastien Lafont, a young balloonist explorer, travels around the world to meet traditional communities who live in remote parts.

Clip.Title: KOMI: A JOURNEY ACROSS THE ARCTIC
Clip.Episode: Komi: A Journey Across the Arctic
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The last reindeer herders in the Arctic Circle make an exhausting fall trek with 5,000 reindeer.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Cuba by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See why West Africa's main waterway is the source of both industry and culture.
